mapper.select: select role_name as roleName, goods_name as goodsName, count(DISTINCT event_id) as eventCount, sum(goods_count) as goodsCount, sum(cost_yb) as costYb, (rank - is_success) as beforeRank, rank as afterRank, max(log_time) as lastTime, log_hour from guangyi_change where role_name = #{roleName} and log_day >= #{startTime} and log_day <= #{endTime} GROUP BY log_hour,is_success,rank, goods_name order by rank asc,is_success desc
